Rule.Name: StaticFieldsNotAllowed
Rule.Description: Static fields are not allowed because they lead to problems with thread safety.
Rule.Resolution: Make the static field '{0}' either readonly or const.

Rule.Name: StringCaseConversionNotAllowed
Rule.Description: You should not call String.ToLower or String.ToUpper as this leads to more time spent in GC.
Rule.Resolution: Remove the call to ToLower or ToUpper from '{0}'. If you need to compare strings, use a case-insensitive comparer instead.

Rule.Name: DirectThreadCreationNotAllowed
Rule.Description: You should not create Thread objects directly. Use the .Net thread pool instead.
